mapper.select: SELECT t.trip_id, t.trip_name, t.user_id, u.user_name, t.trip_start_date, t.trip_end_date, t.trip_create_date, t.trip_content, a.content_id, a.content_type_id, a.title, a.addr1, a.addr2, a.zipcode, a.tel, a.first_image, a.sido_code, a.gugun_code, a.latitude, a.longitude FROM user u INNER JOIN trip t USING (user_id) INNER JOIN trip_item i USING (trip_id) INNER JOIN attraction_info a ON i.attraction_info_content_id = a.content_id WHERE trip_id = #{tripId} ;

SELECT c.trip_comment_id AS id, c.trip_comment_content AS content, c.trip_comment_harmful AS harmful, c.trip_id AS articleId, c.user_id, u.user_name FROM trip t INNER JOIN trip_comment c USING (trip_id) INNER JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE t.trip_id = #{tripId} ;
SELECT h.hashtag_id, h.hashtag_name FROM trip t INNER JOIN trip_and_hashtag m USING (trip_id) INNER JOIN hashtag h USING (hashtag_id) WHERE t.trip_id = #{tripId} ;
